qa.name: Victor
qa.essence: Skilled clockmaker with a desperate mission

hf.name: Amelia
hf.essence: Victor's true love, trapped in time

tr.name: Chronos
tr.clothing: Flowing robes adorned with gears and clock hands

xc.name: Cog
xc.appearance: Small, intricate robot with glowing eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: Time waits for no one, but love... love can conquer even the most relentless of foes.
json_to_edit.description: Victor races against time to save Amelia from being lost forever.
json_to_edit.lighting: Warm, golden glow from numerous clocks and timepieces
json_to_edit.weather: Stormy outside, visible through large windows
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Ticking clocks, whirring gears, distant thunder
json_to_edit.name: Clockmaker's Desperate Quest
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Victor battles against time itself to save his true love, Amelia, with the help of his clockwork assistant and confrontation with Chronos.

qa.action: Victor's expansive clocktower workshop filled with countless timepieces, all ticking in unison.

hf.action: Victor's determined face as he works feverishly on a complex clockwork device.

tr.action: Cog, the clockwork assistant, hands Victor various tools and parts with precision.

xc.action: Chronos appears in a swirl of clock hands and mist, towering over Victor and Cog.

ka.action: Amelia's face, frozen in time, slowly fading away.

fn.action: Victor confronts Chronos, holding up his newly created time-altering device.

af.action: The workshop erupts in a dazzling display of light and spinning clock hands as Victor activates his device.

qo.action: Amelia's eyes flutter open, time restored around her.

fp.action: Victor and Amelia embrace, surrounded by the now-peaceful ticking of countless clocks, with Cog and a subdued Chronos looking on.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Time waits for no one, but love... love can conquer even the most relentless of foes.
updated_json.description: Victor races against time to save Amelia from being lost forever.
updated_json.lighting: Warm, golden glow from numerous clocks and timepieces
updated_json.weather: Stormy outside, visible through large windows
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Ticking clocks, whirring gears, distant thunder
updated_json.name: Clockmaker's Desperate Quest
updated_json.scene_summary: Victor battles against time itself to save his true love, Amelia, with the help of his clockwork assistant and confrontation with Chronos.

label.rationale:
we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", "fn", and "qo" from the "shots" dictionary and update the "list_display_order" accordingly. the number of shots will be reduced from 9 to 5, so we'll also update this value. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove shots "hf", "xc", "fn", and "qo" from the "shots" dictionary.
2. update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" dictionary to reflect the remaining shots.
3. change the "number_of_shots" from "9" to "5".
4. keep all other elements of the json unchanged.

this edit will maintain the overall structure and flow of the scene while reducing the number of shots as requested.
